communityDriven.title: Community Driven
communityDriven.description: Help shape the future of PeakHealth by voting on features and suggesting improvements.

communitySection.title: Help Shape the Future
communitySection.description: PeakHealth is community-driven. We believe the best features come from the people who use the app every day. Vote on upcoming features, suggest improvements, and see what we're working on.

howItWorks.title: How
howItWorks.description: Get started in three simple steps and transform your fitness journey with our intuitive workout tracking platform.

createRoutine.title: Create Your Routine
createRoutine.description: Build custom workout routines or choose from our library of exercises. Set your goals and track your progress.

logWorkouts.title: Log Your Workouts
logWorkouts.description: Track each exercise with sets, reps, and weights. Mark warmup sets, drop sets, and failure sets for complete accuracy.

monitorProgress.title: Monitor Progress
monitorProgress.description: View detailed charts, personal records, and exercise history. See your progress over time and stay motivated.

smartRestTimers.title: Smart Rest Timers
smartRestTimers.description: Automatic rest timers between sets to optimize your workout flow

exerciseLibrary.title: Exercise Library
exerciseLibrary.description: Comprehensive database with high-quality exercise videos and instructions

personalRecords.title: Personal Records
personalRecords.description: Track and celebrate your achievements with automatic PR detection

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Fitness Journey?
cta.description: Join thousands of users who have already achieved their fitness goals with PeakHealth. Start your free trial today and experience the difference.

footer.description: Transform your fitness journey with personalized workouts, expert guidance, and a supportive community.

features.subtitle: Discover what makes PeakHealth the ultimate workout tracking platform
features.description: We're working hard to bring you detailed information about all our features. Check back soon for a comprehensive overview of what PeakHealth has to offer.
features.coreFeaturesList: Workout logging, progress tracking, personal records, exercise library, and community-driven development.

contact.title: Need More Help?

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: How we protect and handle your data
privacy.description: Our comprehensive privacy policy is being developed. We're committed to transparency and protecting your personal information.
privacy.commitmentText: We value your privacy and will provide clear information about how we collect, use, and protect your data.

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.description: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure.

security.title: Security First
security.description: Your data is encrypted in transit and at rest, with regular security audits and updates to maintain the highest protection standards.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: We're open about what data we collect, how we use it, and who we share it with. No hidden agendas or surprise data usage.

control.title: User Control
control.description: You have full control over your data. Access, modify, or delete your information at any time through your account settings.

community.title: Community Trust
community.description: We build trust with our community by being transparent about our data practices and respecting your privacy choices.

compliance.title: Legal Compliance
compliance.description: We comply with all applicable privacy laws and regulations, including GDPR, CCPA, and other data protection standards.

contact.title: Questions About Privacy?
contact.description: If you have any questions about our privacy practices or want to exercise your data rights, we're here to help.

roadmap.title: Product Roadmap
roadmap.subtitle: See what we're building and vote on upcoming features
roadmap.description: Our interactive roadmap is under development. Soon you'll be able to see our development timeline, vote on features, and track our progress.
roadmap.featuresList: Feature voting, development timeline, progress tracking, and community feedback integration.

voting.title: Feature Voting
voting.description: Vote on upcoming features and help us prioritize what matters most to our community.

timeline.title: Development Timeline
timeline.description: See our planned release schedule and track progress on features you're excited about.

progress.title: Progress Tracking
progress.description: Monitor the development status of features and get updates on implementation progress.

feedback.title: Community Feedback
feedback.description: Share your thoughts on features and participate in discussions about upcoming releases.

community.title: Community Integration
community.description: Connect with other users and collaborate on feature suggestions and improvements.

analytics.title: Roadmap Analytics
analytics.description: View voting trends, feature popularity, and community engagement metrics.

cta.title: Help Shape Our Future
cta.description: Your feedback drives our development. Share your ideas and help us build the features you want.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Our terms and conditions for using PeakHealth
terms.description: Our terms of service are being finalized. We're working to ensure clear and fair terms for all users.
terms.featuresList: Clear terms of use, user rights and responsibilities, service limitations, and dispute resolution processes.

termsOfUse.title: Terms of Use
termsOfUse.description: Clear guidelines on how to use our platform responsibly and what constitutes acceptable behavior.

userRights.title: User Rights & Responsibilities
userRights.description: Your rights as a user and your responsibilities when using our platform and services.

serviceLimitations.title: Service Limitations
serviceLimitations.description: Clear information about service availability, limitations, and what we can and cannot provide.

disputeResolution.title: Dispute Resolution
disputeResolution.description: Fair and transparent processes for resolving any issues or disputes that may arise.

legal.title: Legal Framework
legal.description: The legal basis for our services and how we handle legal matters and compliance.

contact.title: Contact & Support
contact.description: How to reach us for questions about our terms or to report violations and concerns.

contact.title: Questions About Terms?
contact.description: If you have questions about our terms of service or need clarification on any points, we're here to help.

hero.title: Our Vision for
hero.description: Health today is severely deteriorated and focused on solving problems after they occur rather than addressing the root cause. That's why we want to help expand global and integrative health.
hero.subtitle: We're building a future where health is proactive, holistic, and accessible to everyone.

problem.title: The Problem
problem.description: Today's health systems focus on treating symptoms after they appear, rather than preventing issues at their root. This reactive approach leads to increased healthcare costs, reduced quality of life, and missed opportunities for true wellness.

solution.title: Our Solution
solution.description: PeakHealth empowers individuals to take control of their health journey through comprehensive fitness and wellness approaches. We believe in building sustainable health habits that address the root causes of health issues, not just their symptoms.

holisticHealth.title: Holistic Health
holisticHealth.description: We believe in treating the whole person, not just symptoms. Our vision encompasses physical, mental, and lifestyle factors for complete wellness.

preventiveFocus.title: Preventive Focus
preventiveFocus.description: Instead of waiting for health issues to arise, we empower people to build healthy habits and prevent problems before they start.

globalImpact.title: Global Impact
globalImpact.description: Our vision extends beyond individual users to create a global movement toward better health practices and awareness.

evidenceBased.title: Evidence-Based
evidenceBased.description: Every approach and recommendation is grounded in scientific research and proven health principles.

continuousEvolution.title: Continuous Evolution
continuousEvolution.description: We constantly evolve our understanding and approach based on the latest health research and user needs.

accessibleHealth.title: Accessible Health
accessibleHealth.description: We believe that comprehensive health and fitness should be accessible to everyone, regardless of their starting point.

individual.title: Individual Level
individual.description: Help millions of people build sustainable health habits, prevent chronic diseases, and achieve their wellness goals through comprehensive fitness and wellness approaches.

community.title: Community Level
community.description: Create supportive networks where people can share knowledge, motivate each other, and build healthier communities together.

global.title: Global Level
global.description: Contribute to a paradigm shift in how society approaches health, moving from reactive treatment to proactive prevention and comprehensive wellness.

cta.title: Join Our Mission
cta.description: Be part of the movement to transform global health. Start your journey with PeakHealth and help us build a healthier future for everyone.

careers.title: Join Our Team
careers.subtitle: Help us build the future of fitness technology

currentStatus.title: Current Status
currentStatus.description: We're currently not actively searching for new employees, but we're always interested in connecting with talented individuals who share our passion for fitness and technology.

openCvPolicy.title: Open CV Policy:
openCvPolicy.description: We welcome and review all open CVs from passionate developers, designers, and fitness enthusiasts who want to make a difference in the fitness industry.

howToApply.title: How to Apply

howToApply.note: We'll review your application and reach out if there's a potential fit for future opportunities.

responseTime.description: We typically respond to all inquiries within 24-48 hours during business days. For urgent matters, please include "URGENT" in your subject line.

currentStatus.description: Our feedback system is being built. Soon you'll be able to submit feature requests, report bugs, and vote on community suggestions.

getInTouch.title: Get in Touch

comingSoon.description: Our dedicated feedback platform will include feature voting, issue tracking, and community discussions. For now, please use the email above to share your thoughts with us.
